hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best overall hack. Hacks will be judged on technical, design, viability, and the creativity.
Second best hack overall hack. Hacks will be judged on technical, design, viability, and the creativity.
Third best overall hack. Hacks will be judged on technical, design, viability, and the creativity.
Determine how to Machine Learning, AI, & recommendations to help users in financial setting.
Determine and develop an MVP for a use case of blockchain technology in the non-prime lending or short term credit industry. (Finance Track)

We are challenging the participants to create an application (web or mobile) that can be used at elementary and middle schools or STEM camps to teach students about creativity involved in software development and basic coding principles.
Best use of Spark, either API SDK
